casebody.data:
Minton, Respondent, v. New York El. R. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. January 6, 1890.) Appeal from special term. Action by Sophie E. Minton against the New York Elevated Railroad Company and another.

Argued before Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
